title: Yoga for Vertigo  |  15-Minute Yoga
description:
Join me for this 15-minute Yoga For Vertigo session. Begin this relaxing practice by improving blood circulation and balancing the hemispheres of the brain with breath work, or pranayama.

This gentle session is designed to activate and calm the parasympathetic nervous system.
This short practice could be beneficial for those who are recovering from injury, TBI (traumatic brain injury), or those who are working with Glaucoma.

Be mindful, take it slow, and Find What Feels Good.

Namaste.

For more videos like this, try this Yoga For Glaucoma and Vertigo Playllist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLui6Eyny-UzyfTUQJWjiCn3Gdi8snJ5fW

channelDescription:
WELCOME to Yoga With Adriene! Our mission is to connect as many people as possible through high-quality free yoga videos. 
We welcome all levels, all bodies, all genders, all souls!
If you're brand-new to yoga, check out my Yoga For Beginners and Foundations of Yoga series. These are designed to give you the tools to build a happy, healthy at-home yoga practice. 
Do your best, be authentic, and FIND WHAT FEELS GOOD.
Jump on in! You don't even have to leave your house. 

Love, Adriene

comments: This is your reminder to slow down. What are you doing to fill your cup today?

Explore day 6! Very grateful for this! Have a good day, guys!
Thank you, Adriene and YWA community💚💚💚

EXPLORE - March 2025 Day 6. Had to do Day 5 as well to catch up but both practices were short. So now I'm back on schedule. Sending love & hugs to all and gratitude, as always, to Adriene & Benji, for keeping us all on track!

All of the love to those who live with Vertigo and similar disorders but tackle life like a boss 💪 (which is all of you! You’re doing great!) have a wonderful Sunday everyone ❤️ namaste Adriene and Benji 🙏
I don't know why every time I do yoga I shed a few tears. It's like the way of my body to say thanks!
